processSection.subtitle: Our Process
processSection.title:
How We Turn Your Figma
Vision into Shopify Reality

steps.title: Design Analysis & Planning
steps.content: We dive deep into your Figma files, understanding every element, interaction, and user flow you've envisioned.

steps.title: Custom Code Development
steps.content: Our developers hand-code every section using clean HTML, CSS, and JavaScript – no bloated page builders that slow down your site.

steps.title: Responsive Optimization
steps.content: Your design looks perfect on desktop, tablet, and mobile. We ensure every breakpoint is flawless.

steps.title: Shopify Integration
steps.content: We seamlessly integrate all Shopify functionalities – cart, checkout, product pages, collections, and more

steps.title: Speed & SEO Optimization
steps.content: Your store loads in under 3 seconds and is optimized for search engines from day one.

steps.title: Quality Testing
steps.content: Rigorous testing across browsers and devices ensures everything works perfectly before launch.

whyChoose.subtitle: Why Choose Us
whyChoose.title: The Numbers Don't Lie
whyChoose.content: We specialize in transforming static Figma designs into lightning-fast, fully-responsive, and scalable Shopify storefronts. Our process ensures your brand’s vision is never compromised.
